title: Conform Esports Black Looking For Diamond 4+ Jungle/Mid
body:
Conform Esports black is looking for diamond 4+ players in the Mid/Jungle Position. This is a serious team that absolutely requires you to show up to practice and we have dedicated staff behind us in order to improve. We are a team focused around doing tournaments, ranked 5's, and weekly ladders. We usually play around 8-9:30pm est.


Requirements
-Main your role
-Must show up to practice or tell somebody you're not going to make it
-Positive team environment
-Must be 18 years or older
We are mainly looking for people who communicate well with the team.


Application
IGN:
Rank:
Age:
Role:
Top 3 Champions (for each role):
Are you able to make practice?
Any previous Team 5's experience?
Additional info:
After you fill out application please add me ingame (c9 limecountry).

replies.body:
Application
IGN: Arrowe / Arrowee (Main/alt)
Rank: D4, Peak master promos
Age: 17
Role: Jungle
Top 3 Champions: Elise, Rek'Sai, Kha'Zix
Are you able to make practice? Yes
Any previous Team 5's experience? Yes
Additional info: I have a large champion pool and play both the carry and support styles. I'm currently with a Desperado Esports but things are going rough so I'm trying to look elsewhere

IGN: Shangdi DMW
Rank: Diamond 4 (Peak D2)
Age: 18
Role: Mid
Top 3 Champions (for each role): Zilean, Azir, Taliyah
Are you able to make practice? At any time necessary
Any previous Team 5's experience? Played on two high level diamond teams totaling $200 and 70k RP in prizing for tourneys
Additional info: Champion pool much wider than that listed, can play a LOT of champs at a high level
